issue.title: [CF 413] Unit reaction condition not working with r399
issue.body:
Up until r398 the following icon stayed hidden except when targeting a live hostile mob.  With r399, The icon always stays hidden:

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SShowTimerText^B ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SREACT ^SUnit^Starget ^SLevel^N1 ^t^N2^T ^SType^SALIVE ^SUnit^Starget ^t^Sn^N2 ^t^SType^Scooldown ^SUnAlpha^N0.5 ^SShowWhen^Salways ^SEnabled^B ^SName^S33878 ^t^N48015^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user Lokmar | Imported from CurseForge issue #413 | Raw

comments.body:
That's weird. I will look into it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Fixed in r401


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Maybe not. Still some strange bug going on.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Knocked out 2 at once in r402. Everything should be working as intended now.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
